description: This promptware is used to convert natural lanugage to Stripe API.
creator: OpenAI

natural_language_to_stripe_api.name: natural_lanugage_to_stripe_api
natural_language_to_stripe_api.description: This promptware is used to convert natural lanugage to Stripe API.
natural_language_to_stripe_api.instruction:
"""
Util exposes the following:

util.stripe() -> authenticates & returns the stripe module; usable as stripe.Charge.create etc
"""

input.text:
import util
"""
Create a Stripe token using the users credit card: 5555-4444-3333-2222, expiration date 12 / 28, cvc 521
"""
